entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Dunchurch
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:25 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.1°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 5:03 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. Forecast issued 5:03 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 5:03 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
